column4: could someone explain to me how to add http://people.ubuntu.com/~jdub/edgy/ to my sources.list? I know that I need to add another deb line, but how do I find out the section name?
see system->administration->package management, you can add manual deb lines there
I still need to know the section name to do that.
sorry! i mean system->administration->software properties (do not know english name)
